title: Hayatımın Şansı
overview: Yonca, is a young mother in her mid-twenties trying to hold on to life with her youngest daughter Sare. On the one hand, she is struggling with the difficulties of life alone, on the other hand, she is dealing with the custody case of Sare's biological father. When everything hits a dead end, she receives a life-changing offer. Now a new life begins for Yonca. But little does she know that; while escaping from the rain, she will be caught by hail.
